  • Field Details

    • color

      public final Color color

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String nickname, GameState gameState, Color color)
      Default constructor When the game is initialized, every SocketClientConnection has to provide his nickname. In this way, when we create the player's instance, we set also his nickname. Therefore, the setter of nickname is unnecessary and useless.
      Parameters:
      color - color of player's workers
      gameState - game in which the player participates
      nickname - player's nickname

      Parameters:
      indexes - : is the TileIndexes' array selected by the player during the setup of the game
      Throws:
      AlreadySetException - if workers are already instantiated for this player
